articles.author: Samantha Ibrahim
articles.title: 'Jeopardy!' winner enters record books with 14th victory - New York Post
articles.description: Roach won $34,000 during Friday’s game and brought her prize money to a whopping $320,081.
articles.content:
“Jeopardy!” has a brand new winner on the books.
Contestant Mattea Roach, 23, scored her 14th win on Friday, earning a spot among the top contestants on the long-running game show.
Roach took home … [+2482 chars]
